Flight medic to MFA creative nonfiction grad. ENFP. Fan of poetry, memoir, intersectional SJ, & stray dogs. Nonfiction editorial lead at http://daCunha.global.
Oct 17, 2016

Collaboration Of Souls II

Connection is not simply a bond

It is 
older than that
and primal.

It is in
learning to
make fire last.

It is in
the thick of a forest
the surge of a wave
the eye of the storm.

It is in
that place we sit 
for hours after we’ve 
said all there is to say 
and the only sound is 
that of rain hitting the 
roof and we can pause
taking comfort in those 
moments of assured 
silence knowing words 
are not required.

What does connection mean to you Crooked Little Flower, Tremaine L. Loadholt , tigger porn , Anna Now , Todd Hannula 🤓 , Tamyka Bell , Gloria DiFulvio , Richard Palmquist, DVM GDVCHM CCHVM , Meg Barclay , Heath Houston , BHD , Michelle Stone , Wild Flower , Samuel Paden, marika bianca , Solitary Cook, Jessica Kaisk , Lizella Prescott, Elliot Nichols, Jewels, H. Nemesis Nyx, Clay Rivers, Michelle Stafford, Jules, Sherry Caris, Molly S Hill, David Moser, augustkhalilibrahim, JB, Sean Howard, Lisa Renee, Ezinne Ukoha, Deborah Foster 🍁, Mary and anyone else who has an idea.

Allan Rae is a qualitative researcher exploring the intersections of HIV, stigma and PTSD through the use of personal and community narrative. In 2006 he left a career as a flight paramedic to obtain his MFA in creative nonfiction. Stray dogs, satire, and Starbucks do not displease this ENFP.
